snippet: Many investors suffered in the last quarter’s sell-off, but losses in large-cap stock funds weren’t as bad as those for riskier, small-cap portfolios.
lead_paragraph: Many investors suffered in the last quarter’s sell-off, but losses in large-cap stock funds weren’t as bad as those for riskier, small-cap portfolios.

headline.main: It’s Small Consolation, but Big-Company Funds Fared Better
headline.print_headline: It’s Small Consolation, but Big-Company Funds Fared Better
headline.seo: Large-Cap Funds Fared Better in Quarter, Relatively Speaking
